cause.description:
The She Should Run campaign is a comprehensive effort by the Women's Campaign Forum to gather nominations of 1,000 pro-choice women who should run for public office.
http://www.sheshouldrun.com
1. We don't have nearly enough women in elected office.
2. Research shows that women are much more likely to run for office if someone asks them to.
3. By encouraging women at the beginning of their political careers, we will build a pipeline of pro-choice women to lead our country for years to come.
cause.mission: To ensure pro-choice women become leaders in politics.
cause.name: She Should Run
